text:
Hi Gustavo
Recommend that you watch this video, which explains the concept very well: <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=psCjEB4CEvs>

In the video, he uses <https://webhook.site/> to test his webhooks.  My personal preference is to use <https://pipedream.com/requestbin> but both provide a similar experience.
I would recommend submitting a support ticket if you feel like something is broken in some way. This is the fastest way to get these issues to the right team to investigate.
Pretty sure that issue shows up when there is a timeout though. So I would recommend trying to reconnect your portals that aren’t working and see if they just needed a refresh or something like that.

In my case there were too many files to fetch and it caused timeout error (on the "client" side). You can override default 15s timeout by adding `httpTimeout` to HubSpot.config.yml file.
```httpTimeout: 60000```
